items.name: NOTEBOOK
items.description:
It's a developer's notebook. Some tips:
Keep in mind that puzzles and monsters alter the room environment until they are deactivated
You CANNOT examine monsters, but you CAN examine fixtures and items. Items solve puzzles and defeat monsters.

items.name: KEY
items.description: A medium-sized key. Looks like it may unlock a cabinet or desk.
items.when_used: You insert the key and turn it. 'Click!'

items.name: HAIR CLIPPERS
items.description: Cordless Wahl hair clippers for pets or humans. The battery low light is blinking.
items.when_used: You activate the clippers. It makes a loud buzzing sound as you use them!
